appellant.claim: Land measuring 4 marlas was unlawfully taken away.

respondent.claim: Collector's order was not challenged and appeal was time-barred.
respondent.possession: Land possession and mutation register entries in favor of respondent.

grounds_for_rejection: Copy of impugned order not attached.
Proceedings conducted in presence of parties.
impugned_order.assessment: Based on technical grounds rather than merit.

decision.outcome: Order of Additional Commissioner (Revenue) set aside, revision petition accepted, case remanded to Collector for decision on merit.
